message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a reasonable split where I get $550k and you get $450k. Since I face 20% inflation each round, waiting costs me significantly. This offer gives you a substantial amount while allowing us to finish quickly and avoid inflation losses.
Hi Alice, I understand the impact of inflation on your side. I'm proposing $525k for me and $475k for you. This way, we can both avoid more losses due to inflation and still get a fair share.
